transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Aditi speaking, very good morning.
Customer: Morning.
Executive: Aditi from IndiaMART head office. I am calling from IndiaMART.
Customer: IndiaMART?
Executive: Yes sir. Haan boliye madam.
Executive: Ji sir, main isliye aapko connect kar rahi thi na, kyunki sir yahan pe aapke dekhiye maine aapko mail bhi share kiya hua hai aapne check kiya hoga.
Executive: Jo aapne buyleads ka feedback diya tha na sir, usko leke pehle to ek specific question tha. Aur dusra hai na sir, Suthir Kirloskar diesel generator.
Executive: Iski leads par mostly aap consume kar rahe hain to jo product apne added nahi hai.
Executive: To company ka sir ye query hai ki agar aap isme deal kar rahe hain to hum wo product add kar denge.
Customer: Nahi madam, abhi correct hai na madam, sabhi theek hai hamara.
Executive: Nahi Kirloskar diesel generator aur sir, sir hamare sabhi hai hamare, sabhi hai na product mein.
Executive: Product kya dekhne aapke paas?
Customer: Hai sabhi hai na madam, jo jo bhi mention kiya sabhi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, Kirloskar wala sir aapke catalog mein added nahi hai. Aapne buyleads ki complaint ki hai.
Customer: Sabhi hai madam, Kirloskar hai, Mahindra hai, sabhi hai.
Executive: Aur Sudhir diesel?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Sudhir diesel generator?
Customer: Nahi nahi, wo sabhi nahi madam, hamara area nahi hai. Sudhir nahi hai. Jo bhi hai madam, it is okay now, abhi jo bhi hai it is okay now with me.
Executive: Okay, to sir Sudhir, jo ye Sudhir wala hai na, iski vajah se aapko irrelevant lead aayegi. Aap ek baar apna IndiaMART application open karenge, usme sir not relevant isko mark karna hai.
Customer: Okay madam, main karunga madam. Ji.
Executive: Ji, kaise karna hai main aapko guide kar deti hu na bhai ko. Nahi madam, thoda bahar hu madam main okay. Malum hai lo madam mujhe irrelevant isme ja ke not relevant bol ke right click karke ye karne madam, malum hai mujhe. Okay.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul. Okay.
Executive: Aur sir ek ye other than that ek aur request thi aapki. Jo buyer aapko sir directly inquiry kar raha hai na, please usko proper follow up mein rakhiye. Call to aap definitely kaafi achcha answer kar rahe hain.
Customer: Okay madam, theek hai lo madam.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Okay madam. Okay sir. Okay sir. Thank you madam. Thank you.
Executive: Most welcome sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive inquired about Kirloskar diesel generator.

- Customer receiving irrelevant leads due to Sudhir diesel.

- Executive requested proper follow-up with direct inquiries.



Resolution:

- Customer confirmed Kirloskar, Mahindra products are available.

- Customer agreed to mark Sudhir as not relevant.

- Executive appreciated customer's call answering skills.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, irrelevant leads, follow up
